components.name: API Server
components.description: Handles incoming requests for application deployment, database management, and user authentication.

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores application data, user information, and deployment configurations. Supports multiple database types like PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

components.name: Docker Management
components.description: Manages Docker containers for application deployment, scaling, and orchestration using Docker Compose and Docker Swarm.

components.name: Frontend Dashboard
components.description: User interface for managing applications, viewing logs, and monitoring resource usage.

components.name: Notification Service
components.description: Sends notifications to users regarding deployment status and alerts through various channels like Slack and Email.

data_flows.description: User interactions on the dashboard trigger API calls to deploy applications or manage databases.
The API server interacts with the database to store and retrieve application and user data.
The API server sends commands to the Docker Management component to deploy or scale applications.
The API server communicates with the Notification Service to send deployment success or failure alerts.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Separates user data management from application deployment processes.

trust_boundaries.name: Deployment Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Isolates the deployment process from user interactions to prevent unauthorized access.
